sources.description: Title: The Clue of the Missing Ape Summary: Directed by: James Hill Actors: Nati Banda, Roy Savage, George Cole Production Company: GB Instructional Films Release Date: November 1953 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Add Full Plot

metadata.Plot: Two youngsters round up crooks to blow up British fleet off Gibraltar.
metadata.Writer: Donald Carter, Gilbert Hackforth-Jones, Margaret Hackforth-Jones
metadata.Actors: Nati Banda, Roy Savage, George Cole
